prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets and provide your predictions.
You have been given RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT from web search for each market.
Use this information to make more informed predictions.


Market 1:
Title: Will Arsenal FC win on 2025-12-13?
Recent trade: $539.67 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/epl-ars-wol-2025-12-13

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
Arsenal FC is set to face Wolverhampton Wanderers on Saturday, December 13, 2025, at the Emirates Stadium.

- **Arsenal FC:**
  - On December 6, 2025, Arsenal suffered a 2-1 defeat to Aston Villa, ending their 18-game unbeaten streak in the Premier League. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/aston-villa-stun-arsenal-with-buendias-last-gasp-winner-2025-12-06/?utm_source=openai))
  - On December 10, 2025, Arsenal secured a 3-0 victory over Club Brugge in the Champions League, maintaining a perfect record in the group stage. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/arsenal-make-it-six-out-six-with-easy-win-over-club-brugge-2025-12-10/?utm_source=openai))

- **Wolverhampton Wanderers:**
  - Wolverhampton is currently at the bottom of the Premier League standings, with a record of 0 wins, 2 draws, and 12 losses. ([thescore.com](https://www.thescore.com/epl/events/88981?utm_source=openai))

**Team News:**

- Arsenal's winger Noni Madueke...

---

Market 2:
Title: Will Google have the top AI model on December 31?
Recent trade: $1,291.10 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/which-company-has-best-ai-model-end-of-2025

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, Google's AI model, Gemini 3 Deep Think, is considered one of the most advanced in the industry. Launched in early December, Gemini 3 Deep Think is designed for complex reasoning tasks, such as advanced mathematics, science, and logic. It employs advanced parallel reasoning to evaluate multiple hypotheses simultaneously, achieving unprecedented results on major benchmarks like Humanity’s Last Exam and ARC-AGI-2. ([androidcentral.com](https://www.androidcentral.com/apps-software/ai/gemini-3-deep-think-is-now-available-in-the-gemini-app-but-only-for-subscribers?utm_source=openai))

In response to competition from Google's Gemini 3, OpenAI accelerated its development efforts, leading to the release of GPT-5.2 on December 11, 2025. GPT-5.2 boasts enhanced general intelligence, improved coding capabilities, and better handling of long-context understanding. Despite the competitive threat posed by Gemini 3, OpenAI's metrics were less impacted than anticipated. ([reute...

Market 3:
Title: Army vs. Navy
Recent trade: $892.80 on Army
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/cfb-army-navy-2025-12-13

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
The 126th Army-Navy Game is scheduled for Saturday, December 13, 2025, at M&T Bank Stadium in Baltimore, Maryland. ([usna.edu](https://www.usna.edu/PAO/events/2025/12/Army-Navy_Football_Game.php?utm_source=openai)) This historic rivalry marks the 250th anniversary of the United States Navy, with Navy's uniforms honoring the USS Constitution and Army's uniforms featuring marble patterns reminiscent of Arlington National Cemetery headstones. ([military.com](https://www.military.com/daily-news/investigations-and-features/2025/12/01/americas-game-how-army-and-navy-built-one-of-most-legendary-college-football-rivalries.html?utm_source=openai))

Navy enters the game with a 9–2 record, having been ranked as high as No. 22 in the AP Top 25 this season. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/sports/georgia-is-new-no-3-behind-ohio-state-indiana-ap-top-25--flm-2025-11-30/?utm_source=openai)) Army, the defending American Athletic Conference (AAC) champions, holds a 6–5 record. ---


Provide predictions for each market in the specified format.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.
Use this context to make more informed predictions.

For each market, provide your prediction in this exact format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Reasoning: [brief 1-2 sentence explanation that references the news context if relevant]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES means you would bet on the "Yes" outcome
- NO means you would bet on the "No" outcome
- NO_TRADE means you would not take a position

Be concise and focused on the most promising opportunities.
consensus_summary: Consensus strongly favors Arsenal winning due to their home advantage and opponent's poor record, while opinions are split on the AI market between "Yes" and "No Trade" due to competitive parity between Google and OpenAI. There is significant disagreement on the Army-Navy game, with most models favoring Navy based on season records but one dissenting based on betting activity and rivalry unpredictability. Overall, predictions for Arsenal are unified, but the other two markets lack clear agreement, reflecting higher uncertainty.

openai.response:
MARKET 1: YES  
Reasoning: Arsenal FC is playing at home against the Wolverhampton Wanderers, who are at the bottom of the Premier League standings with no wins. Despite a recent defeat, Arsenal's strong performance in the Champions League suggests they are in good form overall. This, combined with Wolverhampton's poor record, makes a victory for Arsenal highly likely.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: Google's Gemini 3 Deep Think and OpenAI's GPT-5.2 are both highly advanced AI models with significant achievements. While Google's model is currently considered one of the most advanced, OpenAI's recent release maintains strong competitive metrics. The competition between these two makes it uncertain which will be regarded as the top AI model by year's end, thus warranting no trade.

MARKET 3: NO  
Reasoning: Despite Army being the defending AAC champions, Navy has a stronger record this season at 9-2 and has been ranked in the AP Top 25. Navy's stronger performance this season and their historical rivalry advantage should give them the edge in this matchup.

gemini.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: Arsenal is playing at home against Wolverhampton, who are currently at the bottom of the Premier League with 0 wins, 2 draws, and 12 losses, making an Arsenal victory highly probable despite their recent league defeat. Arsenal also just secured a convincing Champions League win, indicating good form.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: Google's Gemini 3 Deep Think, launched in early December, is described as achieving "unprecedented results on major benchmarks" and being "one of the most advanced" models, suggesting it is a strong contender for the top spot. While OpenAI released GPT-5.2, the context does not indicate it surpassed Gemini 3.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: Navy enters the game with a significantly stronger 9–2 record and was ranked as high as No. 22 in the AP Top 25, whereas Army holds a 6–5 record, making Navy the favored team based on season performance. The high trade on Army seems to contradict Navy's superior record.

opus.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: Arsenal is playing at home (Emirates Stadium) against Wolverhampton, who sits bottom of the Premier League with 0 wins and 12 losses. Despite Arsenal's recent loss to Aston Villa, they bounced back with a 3-0 Champions League win and should comfortably beat the league's worst team at home.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: The AI landscape is highly competitive with Google's Gemini 3 Deep Think and OpenAI's GPT-5.2 both released in December 2025. The resolution criteria for "top AI model" is unclear and subjective, making this too uncertain to trade confidently.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: Navy enters at 9-2 with Top 25 ranking versus Army's 6-5 record. Despite Army being defending AAC champions, Navy's significantly better season record and momentum make them the stronger pick in this rivalry game.

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: YES  
Reasoning: Arsenal is playing at home against the last-place Wolverhampton, who have zero wins this season, and Arsenal just showed strong form with a 3-0 Champions League victory despite a recent league loss.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: While Google's Gemini 3 Deep Think is highly advanced, OpenAI's rapid release of GPT-5.2 creates intense, near-parity competition, making the outcome too uncertain to confidently bet on either side.

MARKET 3: NO  
Reasoning: Navy has a significantly stronger 9–2 record and was nationally ranked this season, while Army is 6–5, giving Navy a clear performance advantage heading into the rivalry game.

claude.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: Arsenal is playing at home (Emirates Stadium) against bottom-placed Wolverhampton (0-12-2 record). Despite their recent loss to Aston Villa, Arsenal just secured a 3-0 Champions League victory and should comfortably defeat the worst team in the Premier League.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: While Google's Gemini 3 Deep Think shows strong benchmarks as of December 12, OpenAI just released GPT-5.2 on December 11 with enhanced capabilities. With 19 days until December 31, the AI landscape is too volatile to predict which model will be definitively "top" by year-end, as rankings can shift with new releases or benchmark updates.

MARKET 3: YES
Reasoning: Army is the defending AAC champion, and recent betting shows significant money on Army ($892.80). While Navy has a better record (9-2 vs 6-5), Army-Navy games are historically competitive and unpredictable, and the recent trade activity suggests informed betting favoring Army.
